txt.en: The Abyss of Mordath: The Order of Death

The Order of the Eye descended into the Abyss of Mordath to defeat the Firehorns and seek the lost artifacts of the Dark Lord, but instead they have found secrets more terrible than they dared imagine.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 of the Abyss of Mordath raid.</rgb>

The Order of the Eye descended into the Abyss of Mordath to defeat the Firehorns and seek the lost artifacts of the Dark Lord, but instead they have found secrets more terrible than they dared imagine.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This deed can only be completed on Tier 2 of the Abyss of Mordath raid.</rgb>
You have completed 'Challenge: The Order of Death'.
